author: gstein
msg: Implement svn_wc__db_read_children() as a variant of base_get_children. It
uses some sneaky sql syntax for its work.
(statements): tweak STMT_SELECT_BASE_NODE_CHILDREN to accept a wc_id
rather than (incorrectly) assuming one. add a new statement for
selecting the union of BASE and WORKING children.
(gather_children): refactored contents of base_get_children, taking a
statement_key for which statement to run.
